content: upper crust crochet original peeking cat butt coaster by jan this pattern and the pictures shown here are copyrighted feel free to sell items you make using this pattern however i would appreciate you putting the link to my pattern in your listing http //www uppercrustcrochet com gauge i crochet very tightly and use an h hook and cotton worsted weight yarn you may want to use an f or g hook depending on the size you want your coaster to be my finished coaster the circle part is 3 1/4″ in diameter stick with cotton yarn acrylic will get really yuckywhen wet slip_stitch= slip_stitch single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet ea= each st s = stitch es chain= chain start by working 8 single_crochet sinto a magic_ring with the pink yarn fasten_off round 1 attach the color yarn you want to use for kitty and work 2 single_crochet sin eastaround for 16 sts do not join you are going to work rounds continuously without joins so it is smooth round 2 *work 2 single_crochet sin first st scin next st* repeat from* to* around for 24 sts round 3 *work 2 single_crochet sin first st scin next 2 sts* repeat from* to* around for32 sts round 4 *work 2 single_crochet sin first st scin next 3 sts* repeat from* to* around for40 sts round 5 *work 2 single_crochet sin first st scin next 4 sts* repeat from* to* around for48 sts slstin next 3 sts ch18 slstin 2nd chfrom the hook scin eaof the next 2 chains 2sc in eaof the next 3 chains scin ea ofthe next 10 chains leave the last chain empty skip the next ston the cat s body slstin the next slstin the next 19 sts ch6 slstin 2nd chfrom the hook scin next chain hdcin eaof thenext 2 chains skip the last chain skip the nextston the body slstin the next slstin the next2 sts ch6 slstin 2nd chfrom the hook scin next chain hdcin eaof thenext 2 chains skip the last chain skip the nextston the body slstin the next 20 sts the last 2 slip_stitch sare going to be a little tougher because you are slip stitching into slip_stitch sfrom before remove your hook leaving the loop insert your hook into the next stfrom theback of the cat body see pic a on page 2 and grab the loop with your hook and pull through ch1 page 1 a b you will now be working on the back of the cat we will be working on the original stitches from the single_crochet sfrom round 5 and not the slststitches see pic b in the back loops only work the stitches in the into each stitch across do not start in the same stas ch1 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet s double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet s half_double_crochet single_crochet turn 11 sts ch1 now go back to working through both loops 2 single_crochet s half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet s 2 double_crochet s double_crochet
